TITLE Magic Smoked Chicken

# Prepare sous vide water bath to 158F.
# In a bowl mix [10 g Liquid smoke],  [30 g Molasses],  [5 g pepper], and [smoked salt].
# In a vacuum bag combine [4 item chicken thighs] and smoke sauce.
# Cook for three hours.
# Optional chill chicken for future finishing.
# Grill chicken to develop browning.
